attributes.review: This app is filled with fake news and countless marketing ploys in attempts to brainwash users into voting for Trump. He complains about “leftist fake news” but every source I have seen on this app COMPLETELY IGNORES all of his flaws.
attributes.title: Pushing a FASCIST agenda

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to understand more of why people support trump , it made my phone glitchy and slow , and it wouldn’t let my switch between tabs , it would trap me in the app until i had to fully power down my phone. it’s a no from me. download at ur own risk
attributes.title: didn’t like it one bit

attributes.review: Horrible app that made my phone glitch, even when you call it’s name it doesn’t respond. It’s a rude app that I would never invite to my dinner party🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊
